data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Perl module to perform the Kruskal-Wallis statistical test and the
    post-hoc Newman-Keuls test. Both of which are commonly used
    statistical test, for which no perl implementation exists in CPAN.
    When time allows, more post-hoc tests will be included.

    Requires Statistics::Distributions to convert K-W stats into p
    values.
